shattered.description: Your mind is shattered! Good luck speaking properly.

inspired.description: You are inspired! Your crit chance has been slightly raised.

ascendant.description: You are ascendant; the world bends to your very will, and your power knows no bounds! Your critical strike chance is 100%.

poisoned.description: Uh oh, you've been poisoned! Your next action that costs AP costs 2 extra AP!

marked.description: You've been marked by a Hunter! The next attack against you from a non-Hunter player will be a critical.

embershield.description: You're burning hot! The next attack against you is blocked, and you convert it into coolness!

fatigued.description: You're feeling really tired... your next action cost 1 extra AP.
